greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = mu(n) where 1<=k<=n and mu=A008683.
formula: T = M * Q, as infinite lower triangular matrices; M = mu(n) in the main diagonal and the rest zeros, Q = (1; 1, 1; 1, 1, 1;...).
